markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Terrain Transposition](/Feats.aspx?ID=1775) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 133 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
warden spells

</column>

---

You are so connected to the wilderness that you can magically jump from place to place within it. You gain the [_terrain transposition_](/Spells.aspx?ID=778) warden spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Terrain Transposition
